author: @WNDU
title: City leaders celebrate milestone in construction of new MLK Dream Center
text: City leaders celebrate milestone in construction of new MLK Dream Center SOUTH BEND, Ind. (WNDU) - The city of South Bend is celebrating a significant milestone in the construction of the new Martin Luther King Jr. Dream Center. Common council members, and city partners hosted a steel topping ceremony on Thursday to mark the placing of the last steel beam on the center facility. Attendees had an opportunity to sign the beam before its placement. The center will replace the old King Center that served the community for over 50 years. The new facility boasts 40,000 square feet and [comes with a $24.5 million price tag](https://www.wndu.com/2023/10/24/mlk-dream-center-funding-approved-245-million/). “To be able to really champion and empower the next generation of leaders, and that’s in every fashion as it relates to after school programming, as it relates to fitness, recreation, and even our financial empowerment center,’ said Jordan Gathers, director of south Bend Venues Parks & Arts. “This is really going to be a holistic approach, and we’re looking forward to it.” The MLK Dream Center has an expected completion date of February 2025. Copyright 2024 WNDU. All rights reserved.

author: Ambitocom
title: Cámaras de colectivos le reclamaron al Gobierno porteño por proyecto de minibuses eléctricos
text:
Las Cámaras Empresarias del Transporte Automotor de Pasajeros enviaron este jueves un petitorio al Jefe de Gobierno Jorge Macri , con el fin de solicitarle una audiencia para plantearle su “disconformidad” con la decisión tomada por el Ejecutivo porteño de incorporar pequeños colectivos eléctricos para realizar algunos recorridos por la zona
El contenido al que quiere acceder es exclusivo para suscriptores.
suscribirse ya estoy suscripto El proyecto de los minibuses eléctricos de la Ciudad de Buenos Aires Todo surgió a raíz de un llamado realizado por el Gobierno de Jorge Macri para incorporar colectivos eléctricos en centro de la ciudad.
Informate más Chau SUBE: cómo funcionará el nuevo sistema de pago en colectivos, trenes y subte CABA: cuánto costará el pasaje de colectivo tras la quita de subsidios Estos serían buses chicos, con un recorrido que unirá el Parque Lezama con la Plaza San Martín, en Retiro , con el objetivo de que vuelva a haber transporte público entre los metrobuses de la 9 de Julio y del Bajo, a donde fueron trasladadas las líneas que antes circulaban por calles como Perú, Chacabuco, Maipú o Piedras.
minibuses electricos 2.webp Los "MUBE" conectarían Parque Lezama con Plaza San Martín.
Según los pliegos publicados, la licitación es por 12 ómnibus, de los cuales 10 estarán operativos y 2 quedarán como reserva. A su vez, no podrán superar los 7.30 metros de largo y tendrán 16 asientos y espacio para pasajeros parados.
El recorrido planificado para los minibuses es en la zona del Casco Histórico, que cuenta con protección ambiental, por lo que no podrían circular a más de 12 kilómetros por hora. Esto haría que el recorrido completo, comprendido por una vuelta de alrededor de 12.3 kilómetros y 36 paradas, demande 97 minutos . Además, la autonomía mínima que tienen es de 170 kilómetros.
El pedido de las Cámaras Empresarias del Transporte de colectivos al Gobierno de la Ciudad “Nos dirigimos a Usted con el objeto de solicitar una audiencia que nos posibilite manifestarle personalmente nuestra sorpresa y preocupación como representantes de las empresas concesionarias de servicios públicos de transporte del Área Metropolitana de Buenos Aires, por el reciente llamado a procedimiento de selección mediante licitación pública, que se publicó en el Sistema de Compras Públicas del organismo a su cargo y que tiene por objeto la instalación de un sistema de transporte de personas con vehículos eléctricos denominado MiniMUBE”, comienza el petitorio.
Sumado a eso, señalaron en la carta enviada a Jorge Macri que, si bien son conscientes de que la Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires posee la competencia sobre el transporte público de pasajeros que transcurre en su territorio, los sorprendió el lanzamiento de “servicio con minibuses eléctricos, en competencia con el servicio público prexistente”.
“En momentos de carencias económicas, las autoridades debieran estar avocadas a estudiar maneras de hacer más eficiente para el usuario la prestación del servicio público, pero nos han sorprendido con un proyecto que tiene por objeto generar uno nuevo, absolutamente superfluo e innecesario, cuyo objetivo final no alcanzamos a visualizar. En efecto, si el objetivo de tal proyecto fuera el de comenzar a experimentar con buses eléctricos , las empresas que representamos siempre se han manifestado predispuestas a que, establecido un marco regulatorio previsible, efectuar parte de sus prestaciones con la utilización de dicho tipo de vehículos , que por lo demás a la fecha no poseen la licencia de configuración de modelo indispensable para su habilitación”, ampliaron en el comunicado.
Asimismo, insistieron que “el sistema cuya implementación se proyecta resulta ser, además, una competencia absolutamente desleal con el servicio público que actualmente prestan nuestras representadas, pues se lo publicita como gratuito para el pasajero, cuando en realidad lo que ello conlleva es un inversión absolutamente desmedida por parte de la ciudad, del que deberán hacerse cargo todos los vecinos, cuya decisión de erogación resulta inexplicable, como resulta inexplicable que se coloque en competencia con el servicio público que debiera estar bajo su jurisdicción, uno nuevo a crearse, sin haber considerado a aquel que debiera ser su responsabilidad”.
“Nuestra propuesta, sr. Jefe de Gobierno es que la Ciudad Autónoma establezca su marco regulatorio y formule un plan integral que resulte ser racional y eficiente , pues la actividad, suponemos es de su conocimiento, atraviesa una severa crisis, cuya continuidad no admite de innovaciones que no se encuentren en armonía con el existente, por lo que solicitamos se deje sin efecto el referido llamado, y cualquier otro proyecto que no sea formulado con la debida consideración de dicho plan integral”, indicaron en la misiva.
Por último, se pusieron a disposición del Gobierno porteño “a los fines que considere, con un ánimo absolutamente colaborativo para lograr, lo que descartamos es también su objetivo, tener un mejor transporte en la ciudad para todos sus usuarios , reiterando nuestra solicitud de audiencia para poder abordar el tema y plantearle nuestras inquietudes y propuestas”.
El petitorio está firmado por la Cámara del Transporte de la Provincia de Buenos Aires (CTPBA), la Cámara Empresaria de Autotransporte de Pasajeros (CEAP) y la Cámara Empresaria del Transporte Urbano de Buenos Aires (CETUBA).

author: ANI
title: India News | PM Modi Hails IMD for Its Exceptional Service to Nation, Advancing Climate Research | LatestLY
text: New Delhi [India], January 15 (ANI): Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday hailed the India Meteorological Department for its exceptional service to the nation and said that the weather department has been instrumental in safeguarding lives and enhancing the understanding of the environment. IMD celebrates its 150th year of service to the nation with yearlong celebrations commencing from January 15, 2024, to January 15, 2025. Also Read | Ram Mandir Consecration Ceremony: Mauritians to Light ‘Diya’, Recite Ramayana During Ayodhya Pran Pratishtha Celebrations on January 22 (Watch Video). Referring to this, PM Modi posted on X, "Today we mark 150 years of the India Meteorological Department's exceptional service to our nation. From pioneering weather forecasting to advancing climate research, IMD has been instrumental in safeguarding lives and enhancing our understanding of the environment." Meanwhile, lauding the India Meteorological Department for issuing timely forecasts of weather events such as cyclones that helped save lives, Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar on Monday said that the IMD's impact extends beyond the borders as neighbouring countries also rely on its expertise as "evidenced" during cyclone 'Mocha'. Also Read | COVID-19 Scare: JN.1 Variant To Soon Become Dominant Strain in China, Say Health Officials. "IMD's impact extends beyond our borders. Our neighbours also rely on IMD's expertise as evidenced during Cyclone Mocha. Our technological progress is also an important mechanism of soft diplomacy because relationships are defined by what a country has to gain from another in economy & technology," Dhankhar said. He also said that the MeT department is touching every life, be it- farmers farming the land or jawans guarding the borders. Launching the yearlong 150th anniversary celebrations of IMD, Dhankhar said that the IMD acts as a safety net protecting our national interest, shielding our citizens from the wrath of nature. "IMD is much beyond just weather forecast, and I am saying this because I am the son of a farmer. IMD acts as a safety net protecting our national interest, shielding our citizens from the wrath of nature, and of course, it is extremely useful for our security concerns. We have come a long way. From agriculture to healthcare, aviation to energy, it is present in our lives and with an affirmative stance. Farmers farming the land to jawans guarding the borders, IMD plays a critical positive role," he added. The Vice President further said that there was a time when rainfall forecasts proved to be incorrect, due to lack of scientific progress, but now the predictions are precise. "There was a time when IMD used to predict rains and there were no rains because there was little scientific progress. Now so much is the precision, it is by seconds. We are proud of our scientists," the vice president said. (ANI) (This is an unedited and auto-generated story from Syndicated News feed, LatestLY Staff may not have modified or edited the content body)

author: William
title: Gisele Bundchen resumes her daily workout routine in Miami after Hurricane Milton pummeled Florida
text:
By Alesia Stanford for Ny Breaking.Com
Published: 7:16 PM EDT, October 11, 2024 | Updated: 7:23 PM EDT, October 11, 2024
Gisele Bündchen appeared to be returning to her normal routine on Friday after laying low following Hurricane Milton’s devastation in the state of Florida.
The model, 44, who recently posed during a sexy photo shoot in her native Brazil, appeared to wave to a friend as she returned from her morning coffee in Miami.
The city was not hit as hard by the massive hurricane as the rest of the state, and many Floridians forced to evacuate their homes sought refuge from the storm there.
The cover model looked relaxed in a gray sweatshirt with figure-hugging black leggings.
She stepped out in a pair of black slippers and carried a taupe-colored bag.
Gisele Bündchen appeared to be returning to her normal routine after retreating from the havoc wrought by Hurricane Milton in the state of Florida, returning from a coffee outing in Miami on Friday morning
Her golden blonde hair was brushed into loose waves and she appeared makeup-free.
A while later, the leggy beauty was spotted wearing black workout shorts with a black T-shirt as she headed to her workout.
The Nourish author wore a pair of beige slides and placed a beige beak hat over her long locks.
She was carrying a white water bottle and a brown shoulder bag.
Bündchen incorporates a variety of practices into her workout routine, including kayaking, yoga, strength training and jiu-jitsu, according to a 2023 interview with Women’s health .
Walking her dog is a favorite exercise for her and her dog. “Walking is underrated,” she told the publication. “That’s great for me and great for him.”
It was jiu-jitsu that ultimately introduced the model to her current boyfriend, Joaquim Valente, who owns a jiu-jitsu studio in Miami with his brothers Pedro and Gui Valente.
They started dating in June 2023, after first meeting in December 2021, when she sought jiu-jitsu training for her son and subsequently decided to take classes as well.
The model, 44, appeared to be waving to a friend and looked relaxed in a gray sweatshirt with figure-hugging black leggings. She stepped out in a pair of black slippers and carried a taupe-colored bag
A while later, the leggy beauty was spotted wearing black workout shorts with a black T-shirt as she headed to her workout. The Nourish author wore a pair of beige slides and placed a beige beak hat over her long locks
”At first I didn’t even think about it. But when I brought [her son Benjamin, now 14] “When I went to first grade and started talking to Joaquim, I realized it was much more than self-defense,” she told Dust magazine.
“I have a friend who told me about the Valente brothers and their martial arts school, and since I wanted to point my almost teenage son in the right direction, I thought he might be interested in it.”
The athletic beauty has also learned to appreciate the mental growth that comes from her practice, revealing that it has made her a better listener and helped her relax.
Bündchen shares her son and daughter Vivian, who turns 12 in December, with her ex-husband, former NFL great Tom Brady, 47.
Share or comment on this article: Gisele Bundchen resumes her daily workout routine in Miami after Hurricane Milton devastated Florida

author: Aqsa Younas Rana
title: Svitzer's Pioneering Use of Marine Biofuel Reduces CO2 Emissions by 90% in Towage Operations
text:
In a significant stride toward environmental sustainability, Svitzer, a leading towage operator, has unveiled its pioneering move to power its entire fleet of ten tugs in London and Medway with marine biofuel. This transformation was heralded by the successful completion of a biofuel trial aboard the Svitzer Intrepid, leading to the launch of the Ecotow solution. Ecotow not only marks a revolutionary step in towage operations but also promises a staggering 90% reduction in CO2 emissions. This initiative comes at a crucial time as the world grapples with the urgent need for carbon neutrality in the maritime sector.
A Leap Towards Sustainability
The journey towards this eco-friendly milestone began in November 2021 when five Svitzer tugs serving the Isle of Grain LNG terminal in Medway started operating entirely on Hydrotreated Vegetable Oil (HVO) biofuel. This switch not only underscores Svitzer's commitment to environmental stewardship but also sets a new benchmark for the industry. By embracing HVO biofuel, Svitzer is not just reducing its carbon footprint but is also leading by example, showing that viable, sustainable alternatives exist for conventional maritime fuels.
Technological Innovation Meets Environmental Responsibility
In a parallel development, Technip Energies has been commissioned to deliver a Process Design Package for a post-combustion carbon capture project at the Isle of Grain power plant in Southeast England. This ambitious project aims to retrofit three turbines with carbon capture technology, a move that is lauded by scientists as a vital step towards achieving net-zero emissions. With the capacity to capture over two million tonnes of CO2 annually from the Combined Cycle Gas Turbine (CCGT) power station, this initiative represents a significant leap forward in reducing greenhouse gas emissions. Using the Shell CANSOLV CO2 Capture System, the project aligns with the broader goal of rendering the power generation portfolio 80% carbon neutral by 2030.
Charting the Course for a Greener Future
The combined efforts of Svitzer and Technip Energies spotlight the evolving landscape of the energy sector, where innovation and environmental responsibility intersect. The retrofitting of carbon capture technology at the Isle of Grain power plant, managed by the energy firm Uniper, is poised to remove two million tonnes of CO2 from the atmosphere each year. This not only contributes significantly to the global fight against climate change but also aligns with Uniper's ambitious goal of generating over 80% of its power capacity from carbon-free sources by 2030. As these projects unfold, they pave the way for a future where sustainable practices are not just envisioned but are actively implemented across sectors.

title: Cathode Active Materials Market Powering the Future:
text: Cathode Active Materials Market Powering the Future: Sustainable and Innovative Cathode Active Materials InsightAce Analytic Pvt. Ltd. announces the release of a market assessment report on the "Global Cathode Active Materials Market Size, Share & Trends Analysis Report By Material Type (Lithium-Ion Cathode Materials, Lead-Acid Materials, And Other Materials), Battery Type (Lithium-Ion Batteries, Lead-Acid Batteries And Others)- Market Outlook And Industry Analysis 2031" The global cathode active materials market is estimated to reach over USD 38.62 billion by 2031, exhibiting a CAGR of 9.63% during the forecast period. Request for free Sample Pages: https://www.insightaceanalytic.com/request-sample/1522 Cathode Active Materials (CAM) in Lithium-Ion Batteries Cathode active material (CAM) is a crucial component of lithium-ion batteries, commonly used in various battery types. During production, CAM is processed into a slurry and applied to a current collector. However, this process often relies on NMP, a hazardous solvent with a high boiling point. Consequently, market companies are actively investing in R&D and implementing plans to comply with environmental regulations. Market Growth Drivers The market for CAM is driven by several factors: • Rising Demand for Electric Vehicles (EVs): EVs offer improved performance and lower emissions, leading to a surge in demand. This, in turn, drives the demand for CAM as a key battery component. • Technological Advancements: Advancements in the automotive industry and emerging e-mobility trends are propelling market growth across different countries. • Demand for Innovative Battery Materials: The dynamic demand for energy storage solutions with features like rapid charging, long lifespans, and high durability is creating a need for innovative battery materials, including CAM. • Advancements in CAM Technology: Potential technological advancements are expected to increase the adoption of various cathode-active materials. • Streamlined Value Chains: Streamlined value chains within countries are projected to significantly impact future market growth. Challenges and Considerations Despite these growth drivers, some challenges need to be addressed: • Environmental Concerns: The use of NMP in CAM production raises environmental concerns. Significant investments are being made in developing eco-friendly battery materials. • Battery Safety: Concerns regarding battery storage and transportation safety can limit the overall growth of the CAM market. Advancements in processing technologies to refine precursor chemical ammonia (CAM) are crucial for addressing safety concerns. List of Prominent Players in the Cathode Active Materials Market: • 3M • BASF SE • Hitachi Chemical Energy • Johnson Matthey • Kureha Corporation • Mitsubishi Chemical Corporation • Mitsui Mining & Smelting Co., Ltd. • NEI Corporation • POSCO • Pulead Technology Industry Co • Showa Denko • Sumitomo • Technology • Umicore Market Dynamics: Drivers- The government's strict restrictions and further incentives and subsidies for their widespread adoption are expected to cause the electric car industry to see significant growth in the near future. The growing demand for active cathode material in batteries for electric vehicles is one of the key factors influencing the development of this industry. Significant drivers of the market's revenue growth are high production costs for eco-friendly battery materials and quick advances in processing technologies for CAM refinement. There are several prospects due to the ongoing research and technical development in cathode materials and adequate electrolytes, which might enhance their overall capability in terms of stability, charge density, and durability. In addition, expanding initiatives and aggressive investments by nations in renewable energy are anticipated to propel the cathode material market. Challenges: The COVID-19 epidemic and strict safety rules for battery storage and shipping, along with adverse economic conditions, are expected to hinder the growth of the cathode materials market in the coming years. However, the rising demand for cathode materials is being constrained by concerns about battery storage and shipping security. Other vital reasons restricting market revenue development are laws, regulations, and safety issues linked to shipping cathode active materials. Regional Trends: The North America cathode active materials market is expected to register a significant market share in terms of revenue and is expected to grow at a high CAGR in the near future. The rapid development of battery energy storage systems and rising energy consumption are the two main reasons propelling the market's expansion. Communities around this region also concentrate on lowering air pollutants, which is yet another important element boosting market revenue growth. Besides, Asia Pacific had a substantial share of the market. The need for cathode materials is anticipated to rise as batteries are increasingly used in a variety of sectors, including automotive, consumer technology, power tools, and energy supply storage. It is also anticipated that rising demand for electric vehicles in nations like China will increase cathode material consumption. The market is anticipated to rise as a result of factors like the expanding energy demand, high demand for battery power generation, and rising battery consumption in nations like China, India, South Korea, Japan, and Vietnam, among others. The joint venture will produce Cathode Active Material (CAM), a critical battery material that accounts for around 40% of the cost of a battery cell. • In December 2022-The European Investment Bank (EIB) stated, that it would lend USD 39.04 million to Königswarter & Ebell, an entirely German division of Pure Battery Technologies in Australia.
